LanguageData.RWBY_Magnhild_Gun.label: 神威戰錘
LanguageData.RWBY_Magnhild_Gun.description: Magnhild is Nora Valkyrie的招牌武器。 It is a large hammer, with the secondary form of a grenade launcher.
